mapper.insert:
SELECT TO_CHAR(nextval('RESERVE_NO_SEQ'),'FM00000000') AS reserveNo
INSERT INTO reserve ( reserve_no, tour_code, reserved_day, adult_count, child_count, customer_code, transfer, sum_price, remarks ) VALUES ( #{reserveNo}, #{tourInfo.tourCode}, #{reservedDay}, #{adultCount}, #{childCount}, #{customer.customerCode}, #{transfer}, #{sumPrice}, #{remarks} )
mapper.update: UPDATE reserve SET tour_code = #{tourInfo.tourCode}, reserved_day = #{reservedDay}, adult_count = #{adultCount}, child_count = #{childCount}, customer_code = #{customer.customerCode}, transfer = #{transfer}, sum_price = #{sumPrice}, remarks = #{remarks} WHERE reserve_no = #{reserveNo}
mapper.select: SELECT reserve_no, tour_code, reserved_day, adult_count, child_count, customer_code, transfer, sum_price, remarks FROM reserve WHERE reserve_no = #{reserveNo} FOR UPDATE

SELECT r.reserve_no AS reserve_no, r.tour_code AS tour_code, t.planned_day AS planned_day, t.plan_no AS plan_no, t.tour_name AS tour_name, t.tour_days AS tour_days, t.dep_day AS dep_day, t.ava_rec_max AS ava_rec_max, t.dep_code AS dep_code, d.dep_name AS dep_name, t.arr_code AS arr_code, a.arr_name AS arr_name, t.accom_code AS accom_code, t.base_price AS base_price, t.conductor AS conductor, t.tour_abs AS tour_abs, r.reserved_day AS reserved_day, r.adult_count AS adult_count, r.child_count AS child_count, c.customer_code AS customer_code, c.customer_name AS customer_name, c.customer_kana AS customer_kana, c.customer_pass AS customer_pass, c.customer_birth AS customer_birth, c.customer_job AS customer_job, c.customer_mail AS customer_mail, c.customer_tel AS customer_tel, c.customer_post AS customer_post, c.customer_add AS customer_add, r.transfer AS transfer, r.sum_price AS sum_price, r.remarks AS remarks FROM reserve AS r JOIN tourinfo AS t ON r.tour_code = t.tour_code JOIN departure AS d ON t.dep_code = d.dep_code JOIN arrival AS a ON t.arr_code = a.arr_code JOIN customer AS c ON r.customer_code = c.customer_code WHERE r.reserve_no = #{reserveNo}
SELECT SUM(adult_count + child_count) FROM reserve WHERE tour_code = #{tourCode}

SELECT r.reserve_no AS reserve_no, r.tour_code AS tour_code, t.planned_day AS planned_day, t.plan_no AS plan_no, t.tour_name AS tour_name, t.tour_days AS tour_days, t.dep_day AS dep_day, t.ava_rec_max AS ava_rec_max, t.dep_code AS dep_code, d.dep_name AS dep_name, t.arr_code AS arr_code, a.arr_name AS arr_name, t.accom_code AS accom_code, ac.accom_name AS accom_name, ac.accom_tel AS accom_tel, t.base_price AS base_price, t.conductor AS conductor, t.tour_abs AS tour_abs, r.reserved_day AS reserved_day, r.adult_count AS adult_count, r.child_count AS child_count, c.customer_code AS customer_code, c.customer_name AS customer_name, c.customer_kana AS customer_kana, c.customer_pass AS customer_pass, c.customer_birth AS customer_birth, c.customer_job AS customer_job, c.customer_mail AS customer_mail, c.customer_tel AS customer_tel, c.customer_post AS customer_post, c.customer_add AS customer_add, r.transfer AS transfer, r.sum_price AS sum_price, r.remarks AS remarks FROM reserve AS r JOIN tourinfo AS t ON r.tour_code = t.tour_code JOIN departure AS d ON t.dep_code = d.dep_code JOIN arrival AS a ON t.arr_code = a.arr_code JOIN customer AS c ON r.customer_code = c.customer_code JOIN accommodation AS ac ON ac.accom_code = t.accom_code WHERE c.customer_code = #{customerCode} ORDER BY t.dep_day, r.reserve_no
